mapper.select: select wo.*,wd.weight,wd.piece,wdt.transit,wd.arrival_station from wms_offer wo join wms_distribution wd on wo.distribution_id = wd.id and wd.del_flag = '0' join wms_distribution_transfer wdt on wdt.id = wo.distribution_transfer_id and wdt.del_flag = '0' where wo.del_flag = '0' and wo.distribution_code = #{distributionCode} order by wo.create_time desc
